turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to place an order for pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Order at what pizza shop?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order from Blaze.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to tell me what you want or do you need a menu?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please get me a copy of their menu.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Here is a copy of the Blaze menu.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Order two large cheese and black olive pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, let me write that down for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think that should be enough.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just the two pizzas. You have my account info.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, got it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please confirm the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Two large cheese and black olive pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How long?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: All set. It will be ready for pick up in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please send me the receipt.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It will arrive via text message to your cell.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: My number is 456-4567.
